author: James Joyce
text: Dear Roberts: I received another telegram telling me to start for Zurich in Switzerland on Saturday. The cheapest fare is £3.15.0. £3.15.0 2 ———— £7.10.0 I am counting for £1 between you and Ryan. That is not exorbitant, I think, as it is my last. May I count on you for this early on Friday? Answer kindly. I may call.
